name: SOUTH KOREA ðŸ‡°ðŸ‡· - Day 3 Vlog [BBQ, Trains and Busan]
description:
For our last 24 hours in Korea we spent the evening in Hongdae enjoying a traditional Korean hot stone BBQ - which was incredible! We then explored the local area which I feel is strangely reminiscent of Shoreditch in London (mainly the vibe!)

We even ran into a Korea Twitch streamer and talked about Youtube which was fun! The next day we took a train down to Busan in the South of Korea to catch our flight over to Osaka, Japan where the next vlog will pick up! 

Music Used:
"Promise"
Instrumental by Temper Beats
Youtube - https://youtu.be/6eoQ7zcAoJQ
Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/artist/4msU1...

If you're in Seoul check out Piggbank 
331-1 Seogyo-dong, Mapo-gu, Seoul, South Korea
